content:
Curious of the Patient Empowerment response to articles such as these:

A new Jamia study:
https://jamanetwork.com/journals/jamanetworkopen/fullarticle/2780408
Association of Wearable Device Use With Pulse Rate and Health Care Use in Adults With Atrial Fibrillation

And a prior one:
https://academic.oup.com/jamia/article/27/9/1359/5911974
Clinical evaluation and diagnostic yield following evaluation of abnormal pulse detected using Apple Watch

In my own experience, I felt that the home uterine contraction monitor caught preterm labor twice and has alot to do with my healthy delivery orf less premature babies but this study statistically says otherwise: https://www.nejm.org/doi/full/10.1056/NEJMoa002868?query=recirc_curatedRelated_article

@Jan Oldenburg @Maria D Moen @Dave deBronkart @Debi Willis @Abbie Watson
I'll come back to this tomorrow. Sorry for being distracted by vacation last week!
